title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 05 April 2009 - XWiki
content:
arunreddy\_ - (05/04/2009 00:01): sdumitriu : how many applications in total  ?

sdumitriu - (05/04/2009 00:02): 4 discarded

arunreddy\_ - (05/04/2009 00:05): 4 discarded ?  
florinciu - (05/04/2009 00:06): cristinaS: I installed your small extension.   
sdumitriu - (05/04/2009 00:06): 2 duplicates, 1 completely off topic, 1 way too off topic (the disk burner one)  
florinciu - (05/04/2009 00:06): Very nice&easy installation process. That's very good  
cristinaS - (05/04/2009 00:07): :) thanks .. I have a problem .. I thought I can still modify my proposal ..

florinciu - (05/04/2009 00:09): I suggest to use the design page you created intead of your XWiki profile page  
cristinaS - (05/04/2009 00:10): ok .. I put them there because I didn't have the link in the proposal .. but if I can put it in a comment it's great  
florinciu - (05/04/2009 00:11): the prompted me about a version. Do you know if it handles updates from the download site? Or is it another mechanism?  
florinciu - (05/04/2009 00:11): \*the extension

cristinaS - (05/04/2009 00:13): but I'm not sure  
cristinaS - (05/04/2009 00:13): and I have to try

cristinaS - (05/04/2009 00:15): ?

florinciu - (05/04/2009 00:16): 3.0  
cristinaS - (05/04/2009 00:17): i have to try with 2.4 also .. I hope the won't be any compatibility problems  
florinciu - (05/04/2009 00:17): yes. You should put almost everything related to XOO in the design page.

sdumitriu - (05/04/2009 00:17): So you shoul put everything on the wiki

florinciu - (05/04/2009 00:18): so we know how it works
